svg.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; height: 40px; stroke: rgb(255, 65, 54); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible; width: 40px

polyline.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 65, 54); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transform-origin: 0px 0px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible

transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 65, 54); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transform-origin: 0px 0px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible
